name: Clarence's Paradise
description:
Clarence's Paradise is a short game in which you explore and map out a small region and figure out how to activate a machine.

Special thanks to Ezgif.com for their great and intuitive GIF making tools, as well as Gifsicle for their optimization capabilities. All the gifs in this project were made with Ezgif, go to Ezgif.com for all your gif making needs.

To play, enter various directions into the parser to travel, sometimes it's possible to enter numbers to get a closer look at things.

TIP

Type '?' into the text field and press enter for an in game explanation of the goal and how the controls work.

If you have mac, download ClarencesParadiseLite.zip

If you have windows download ClarencesParadiseLiteExe.zip

To play simply extract the zipped folder to wherever you want and launch ClarencesParadiseLite.jar. If you download the windows .exe version, launch clarparl.exe.

NOTE: If ClarencesParadiseLite.jar doesn't work you may need to install or update java. On a mac this shouldn't be an issue but if it is you can easily get the latest version of java here https://java.com/en/
